typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	TableName as string,
	ExtractionTimestamp as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StagedParquet
StagedParquet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:(concat($TableName, '_', [n])),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 10),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataExtractionSinkAvro
